headline: What New Catalysts Are Shaping the Narrative for 3M?
summary: 3M’s stock has seen its fair value estimate edge higher recently, rising from $167.81 to $174.31 as analysts adjust their outlook in light of new developments. This increase is partly due to a slightly lower discount rate, now at 7.49 percent compared to 7.63 percent previously. This suggests investors are perceiving the stock as less risky than before. Stay tuned to see how these shifts and future updates may impact the broader narrative around 3M’s investment case going forward. Stay...
